  • Method Details

    • mergeResultsToPopulateHasOne

      public static <T,U> void mergeResultsToPopulateHasOne(List<T> parentList, List<U> childList, String parentJoinPropertyName, String childJoinPropertyName, String parentHasOnePropertyToPopulate)
      Merges the corresponding child object to the 'hasOne' property of the parent. 
      Example use case: 
1) Query for a list of users
2) Use an IN clause query to get the profiles for the users 
3) Use method mergeResultsToPopulateHasOne() to merge the 2 result sets to populate the user.profile property
      Parameters:
      parentList - The parent list whose 'hasOne' property that needs to be populated
      childList - the child list
      parentJoinPropertyName - The property name on parent used to merge the results
      childJoinPropertyName - The property name on child used to merge the results
      parentHasOnePropertyToPopulate - The parent property to populate

    • mergeResultsToPopulateHasMany

      public static <T,U> void mergeResultsToPopulateHasMany(List<T> parentList, List<U> childList, String parentJoinPropertyName, String childJoinPropertyName, String parentHasManyPropertyToPopulate)
      Merges the corresponding list of child objects to the 'hasMany' property of the parent 
      Example use case could be: 
1) Query to get a list of employees
2) Use an IN clause query to get all the skills for those employees 
3) Use mergeResultsToPopulateHasMany() to merge the 2 result sets to populate the employee.skills property
      Parameters:
      parentList - The parent list whose 'hasMany' property that needs to be populated
      childList - the child list
      parentJoinPropertyName - The property name on parent used to merge the results
      childJoinPropertyName - The property name on child used to merge the results
      parentHasManyPropertyToPopulate - The parent property to populate

    • chunkTheList

      public static List<List> chunkTheList(List list, Integer chunkSize)
      Splits the list into multiple lists by chunk size. Can be used to split the sql IN clauses since some databases have a limitation on 'IN' clause entries and size
      Parameters:
      list - the list to chunk
      chunkSize - The size of each chunk
      Returns:
      Collection of lists broken down by chunkSize
